title: A Bad Movie
description: Kevin sees Bobby as one of the coolest kids in school, but what happens when he pressures Kevin and his friends to sneak into a movie without paying? A Bad Movie follows Kevin as he tries to decide what to do, and realizes the consequences of his actions. Use this book to teach cause-and-effect relationships and using commas in dialogue correctly.
highFrequencyWords: aisle, complex, gloated, hesitated, manager, slumped, sly, smirk, urged
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
awareness: Commas                : Use commas to separate dialog
phonics: Compound Words                : Identify and use compound words
grammar:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
